wikipedia_page.main: Julian Howard Shackleton (born 29 January 1952) is a former English cricketer. Shackleton was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace.

response: Shackleton married his wife, Kathy, in 1951.  She also hailed from his home town, Todmorden.  They had a son, Julian Shackleton, who played  cricket for Gloucestershire, and a daughter.

link_mentions.page: List of Gloucestershire County Cricket Club players
